H0.text: Who painted ‘Le dejeuner sur I’herbe’ in 1863. Claude Monet

H1.text: Who painted ‘Le dejeuner sur I’herbe’ in 1863. Pierre-Auguste Renoir

H2.text: Who painted ‘Le dejeuner sur I’herbe’ in 1863. Gustave Courbet

H3.text: Who painted ‘Le dejeuner sur I’herbe’ in 1863. Manet

A4.text: The Luncheon on the Grass (Le déjeuner sur l'herbe) and Olympia, premiering in 1863 and '65, respectively, caused great controversy with both critics and the Academy of Fine Arts

A5.text: Another major early work is The Luncheon on the Grass (Le Déjeuner sur l'herbe), originally Le Bain
